name: INVERTUS
description:
"Invertus" is a 2D co-op puzzle platformer, where players rely on communication to reach their goals. Join Hocus and Pocus in their show, where they try to find all their lost rabbits, in a humoristic, fun game that resonates with the early decades of the previous centuary.

CONTROLS

A - Jump

Joystick - Move

X - Invertus action

LB \ RB - Restart

LT - Reboot 

This project is my graduation project for Bezalel Academy of Art and Design. 

CREDITS

Coding: Nicole Raskin, Sa'ar Ben-Horin

Art: Nicole  Raskin
